alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 1:30PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Brief Landspout Tornadoes Possible... At 128 PM MDT/228 PM CDT/, conditions are becoming favorable for the development of landspout tornadoes in and close to a line from Culbertson and Benkelman, Nebraska to St. Francis Kansas to Kirk, Colorado. However, at this time it is unknown which if any one storm will produce a landspout. Any landspouts which develop are expected to pose a limited threat. Locations impacted include... St. Francis, Benkelman, Trenton, Bonny Reservoir, Culbertson, Palisade and Stratton. Landspout tornadoes can form with a developing thunderstorm before rain, hail, and even thunder is observed. Landspout tornadoes are not usually associated with a wall cloud and are often difficult to detect with weather radar. &&
